author: @KenJee_ds
text: After publishing the video, it appears that I left out an extremely important part of selling! You need to understand your customer and make sure that you are providing an analysis that is relevant to their end goals. If you are speaking to business stakeholders, they are usually focused on profit / loss, user experience, or other performance metrics. Make sure that you are tying the value of your work to these metrics that are important to them. Thanks again for watching!
